Reviews.Title: Very good product
Reviews.Author: ChillyLos
Reviews.Content: Ordered the product to use while traveling, for extra security in hotel rooms. I chose it over some of the other similar alarm door stops because the alarm sensitivity is adjustable and it has an on/off switch. I haven't used it in a hotel room yet but I tested it in my home. It seems to work great. The alarm is VERY loud! It works very well as a door jam making it extremely difficult to open the door.  It jammed the door on hardwood floors and carpeted floors, but so-so on my tile floors which are kinda smooth.  The alarm feature worked very well in all cases. I had to increase the sensivity to high with the tile floors.Overall I think this is a great inexpensive home and travel security product. I plan to buy a couple more to give as gifts to a few female family members who live alone and don't have a home security system. The great thing about this product is that it not only sounds an alarm but it also stops the intruder from entering the room.The only weaknesses of the product are that it may not work as a door jam if you have very smooth tile floors or if the bottom of your door is very high off the floor.  The alarm will probably work in both these cases, if you set the sensitivity on med or high. If your tile floors have some texture, it should work fine.

Reviews.Title: I like it!
Reviews.Author: Doodleboy
Reviews.Content: I picked this one instead of the other GE product because this one also jams the door from opening.1. Its pretty loud.2. The high sensitivity setting sometimes causes it to trigger when I am placing it on the floor after turning it on. (These things are little difficult to turn on while on the floor)3. Jams the door being opened enough to not let the intruder push the door open and quickly shut the alarm.4. Build quality is solid.5. Could be used for horizontal sliding doors also.Works as advertised. Will buy again without hesitation if I need in future.===============================================================================Update - Jan 2012:After 1.5 years, this thing is still working like new, and I turn it off(morning) and on(night) about 5 days a week. I purchased another similar, but a little different doorstop alarm from Amazon. The difference between this and that is that this one keeps screaming once the foot/door is taken away after the peddle is pressed whereas the other one stops. From a security perspective, this difference is HUGE: Once the alarm is triggered, if the intruder pulls the door back, the alarm will still continue in this one, whereas it will immediately stop in the other one. You DEFINITELY want the alarm to continue ringing (unless the switch is manually turned off).A minor negative, due to the same feature, is that if you move this around on a daily basis (like I do), then you'll have to manually switch it off-then-back-on every time it triggers. In the other one, you have to do nothing since it stops itself. I'd still choose this, esp. for doors that are far away from my ears and even more so for doors that just need this thing left in front of them most of the time.

Reviews.Title: super door stop alarm
Reviews.Author: L. Dame
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item new.  It was shipped quickly and correctly.  I tried this product out yesterday, and to my suprise gave an ear piercing alarm when activated.I'm confident that not only will this product scare off any intruder, but it will also wake the neighboring guests in the adjacent hotel rooms.  It also does a fine job in blocking the door from being forced open.  I would definately recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Waste of money
Reviews.Author: denamac
Reviews.Content: I was so hopeful for this to work. I placed it on  the wooden floor of my apt. and pressed the wedge under the door as far as I could without tripping the alarm, then I tried to open the door. It opened easily and simply scooted the door stop alarm along with it. I tried placing a piece of rubber mat under it to see if this would hold it steady, no luck. Totally worthless and a waste of money, very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Good For College Dorms!
Reviews.Author: Experienced Online Shopper
Reviews.Content: I used this while traveling, and felt very secure with this under my door.  The alarm is very loud, and will scare away any intruder.  Great for parents to buy for their daughters to use in dorms.

Reviews.Title: Nice and Loud
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: I had is set on low when I tested it and it was still really loud. There is no way I would sleep through this alarm, and it didn't take much pressure at all to set it off.

Reviews.Title: DOOR STOP ALARM
Reviews.Author: TC
Reviews.Content: RUBBER PADS ON BOTTOM FALL OFF.NEEDS SPIKE TYPE BOTTOM TO CATCH CARPETMOVES WITH DOOR IN LIEU OF CATCHING.

Reviews.Title: The Good, the Bad, the Ugly
Reviews.Author: mavrik12
Reviews.Content: Although the thought and intention of this product is fantastic the product does not live up to it's $15.00 price. I ordered this device to solve a problem with our apartment's maintenance men coming in without calling. The product works well as far as what it's supposed to do but is definitely not worth the $15.00. A friend of mine bought the same thing from Target for $5.00. If you're looking for something that will alert you and your neighbors; the intentions of this one are good but you can definitely find another place that sells this for much less.

Reviews.Title: Came apart with first try-out!!
Reviews.Author: Lee Smith "blessedmom"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this item as extra security-- put in down on the floor, opened the door and it immediately separated.  The bottom non-skid material completely slid right off.  I emailed the company to get my refund started and it was half a dozen emails of them wanting pictures, to exchange, blah blah blah.  I finally had to insist they just give me the return address to ship back for a refund and FINALLY got it.  What a waste of time and money..

Reviews.Title: Loud alarm works good with some reservations
Reviews.Author: David W. McIlvaine
Reviews.Content: Alarm is loud and sounds when the plate is depressed.  The problem is that the wedge does not have sufficient weight and friction on the base so that the wedge slips on a bare floor and the alarm does not sound. I have put non-slip material under the wedge but it sometimes moves across the bare floor. I need to put something heavy against the back of the wedge, then it works great.  Shipping from Amazon was fast and package arrived two days after I ordered it (without expedited shipping).

Reviews.Title: Fantastic alarm
Reviews.Author: di1386
Reviews.Content: I just recently moved out on my own, and as a single woman I was concerned for my safety.  This door stop alarm is very reasonably priced and piercing when it goes off.  It gives me peace of mind when I set it up at night.  It may not prevent the door from being forced open if my locks fail, but whoever is breaking in will be frightened away, and my neighbors will be alerted.

Reviews.Title: super door stop
Reviews.Author: Linda R Mehalik
Reviews.Content: Doesn't work for my needs. I would not recommend it unless you are really sure what you're looking for as far as use.

Reviews.Title: Super Door Stop Alarm -
Reviews.Author: Topkat
Reviews.Content: Unit slides on the floor.wedge wont fit under the door because of weather stripping. the off switch is on the back making it iffy to brace the rear of it with something.is louder than expected but does not come with a battery

Reviews.Title: Great little device
Reviews.Author: Dang Q. Lieu
Reviews.Content: I recieved the items fast like always. Amazon does a good job. The door alarm requires a 9v which is almost 3 bucks. It has a on an and off switch on the back. sensitivity level on the side, trust me you want it on low because it is louder then a car alarm at 125dlb whatever. One activate just run to it and swicth to off, other wise it dosent stop ringing. I bought 2 and one was not working so I contacted bestdeal and they sent me a new one right away very good customer service. Anywase for 5 dollers and a bottle of sabre mase is the best low cost protection for a small apt is a must.

Reviews.Title: good, though needs a better grip
Reviews.Author: PW Editor
Reviews.Content: Though the product description on Amazon.com states this is 120 decibels, the package it is shipped in says it is 100 decibels. Not a big deal, since it is ear-drum piercingly loud. But the two sources of info should be in agreement.The battery compartment is easy to access. It is one of those standard "push" clip doors. The alarm is VERY LOUD.The only problem I've had with it is the grip. It does not work well with a door that has a high sweep. The grip pad on the bottom of the alarm is good, but not "grippy" enough to grab the floor when a door with a high sweep is opened onto it (i.e., one that doesn't come close enough to the floor to press down very far on the alarm mechanism). But at $6 it's a nice secondary alarm. When I use it I set it up so that as the door opens onto it, it pushes back into a heavy, stable object I've put behind it, and that then causes the door to come in better contact with it and trigger the alarm.

Reviews.Title: Does seem to do what it says
Reviews.Author: A. Davis
Reviews.Content: Does what it is supposed to do.  I have yet to use it at a hotel, but seems to be what I read it was so far.

Reviews.Title: crap
Reviews.Author: beverly pearson
Reviews.Content: big waste of time and money. does not work. tried everything it doesn't even hold the door it just slides around

Reviews.Title: it was worth it!!
Reviews.Author: fran
Reviews.Content: Product works good!! only con I have is that it slides on tiled floors, but besides that it works great on carpet and hardwood floors.

Reviews.Title: So loud!
Reviews.Author: Thais Cesare
Reviews.Content: How could something so small be so loud. I was concerned I wouldn't hear it, no worries there. Be careful around dogs, they hate the sound. Make sure you put it as close as possible to the door opening and place a stopper behind it (like a heavy mat), if you have an un carpeted floor. It may slide.

Reviews.Title: Alarm
Reviews.Author: Mark A. Stevens
Reviews.Content: This I will definitely use in motels for the alarm especially on connecting doors.  I do use it on the inside of a bedroom door...off.

Reviews.Title: Good Idea, But DOSENT WORK!
Reviews.Content: Item is a good idea and probbably would work if it wasnt so cheaply put together. Before going on our trip i tried to test the alarm.3/4 of the time when you open the door the alarm didnt go off.

Reviews.Title: A very good buy.
Reviews.Author: shooter 308
Reviews.Content: This is a Great price. The device is very Simple to use. Loud and effective. I would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Safety First.
Reviews.Author: Michael Pedone
Reviews.Content: Safety first when visiting a strange or new place.This item, which is as described, should give anyone who uses it, a more secure feeling of not being surprised at any time in any room or location behind a closed door.

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Calvinator
Reviews.Content: It works. However its build is a little flimsy IMO. Tis said it is very usable for a security alarm in motel rooms.

Reviews.Title: A Good Night Sleep!
Reviews.Author: Marie Chase
Reviews.Content: Loved traveling with this alarm and using it at each hotel that we stopped at as we travel frequently and stop randomly. Also great in the home with a bit more security where one might now expect to need it such as a cellar door, back porch doors, etc. Even came on the airplane with batteries separate.....good item and sends a message if activated. I even sleep better at night knowing there is an added protection.

Reviews.Title: One of the two do not work even with fresh new batteries. Not good. Sorry to say that. Thnaks. BYE A FRAUD.
Reviews.Author: Edgar De Marchena
Reviews.Content: One of the two do not work even with fresh new batteries. Not good. Sorry to say that. Thnaks. BYE A FRAUD.

Reviews.Title: LOUD!
Reviews.Author: 4eversnowboard
Reviews.Content: The alarm on this beast is ridiculously loud and could almost be used as a weapon. I definitely recommend this product for anybody who wants to be safe.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised
Reviews.Author: Keros "tech lover"
Reviews.Content: Works as advertised.  I put a 9-volt battery in and tested it.  It's nice to bring on vacation and have some peace of mind.

Reviews.Title: What I expected
Reviews.Author: K. Jenkins "K. Jenkins LVN, LMT"
Reviews.Content: Very loud and after  it is set off you must find the switch and tun it off to stop the shrieking. A little cheaply made is why I gave it 4 stars but it was very reasonably priced. Was delivered promptly .

Reviews.Title: Best Home Alarm System for the Price
Reviews.Author: Kate
Reviews.Content: Highly recommend this product. You never know who is able to unlock your doors. When the  door is opened on to this wedge it  will  stop the door from opening further and the alarm is ear piercing. It will deter anyone.  I love this product. Great for the price.

Reviews.Title: amazing and loud
Reviews.Author: P. Triana "Pete"
Reviews.Content: this thing is awesome, it has a hair trigger that can be adjusted. When its on hi and loud it is ear piercing,

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: xyz
Reviews.Content: Excellent product for the house or hotel door.Makes a loud sound.....easy to install battery (battery not included).Even with a slight wedge under the door the alarm goes off.Easy to turn off and reset.

Reviews.Title: Strongly recommend
Reviews.Author: Old_Sarge
Reviews.Content: If you do much traveling and stay in motels/hotels. This is a necessity. Will alert you if someone tries to open the door while you are asleep.

Reviews.Title: Would be better if you could wedge it in.
Reviews.Author: Nevits
Reviews.Content: The alarm goes off if the door hits the lever. If you wedge it under the door, the alarm goes off. It would be better if one could wedge it under the door to prevent it from being opened, then if someone attempted to force the door the alarm would sound.

Reviews.Title: This item works great
Reviews.Author: paula
Reviews.Content: Wow! It's louder than I expected but it can be adjust to lower.  It's light and this will make me feel much safer when I travel.

Reviews.Title: Nice Product
Reviews.Author: shopcheapnchicago
Reviews.Content: I am using it for my back door as an added security measure. No matter where you live its important to have some type of security for your doors especially the back doors. This is reasonably priced and i think I will be buying one  for my mother's hotel stays when she goes on trips. This is really very loud and would startle anyone especially for the price.

Reviews.Title: works...
Reviews.Author: missanne
Reviews.Content: We needed this for our home since we had an intruder in the past. This really works and am so glad we bought it...would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Works great, better than the comparable GE version
Reviews.Author: DF
Reviews.Content: I bought both this and one of the GE alarm stoppers. The GE got sent back, this one stayed and is going strong two years later.The alarm is very loud, and compared to the GE model, has one huge advantage: once the alarm is triggered, it keeps ringing, even if the door is pulled back shut and no longer depressing the wedge. You have to shut it off with a switch on the back to reset.This is much better than the GE model which turns off as soon as pressure is released. If someone was coming through they door and heard the alarm, they'd most likely pull it back shut right away and find some other way in. I'm not sure a 2 second blast would wake me up to investigate. The full on blast not shutting off without manual intervention of this brand would definitely wake me up.Other than that big advantage, I found the two to be of similar quality.

Reviews.Title: Basic LOUD door stopper type alarm
Reviews.Author: stcroix "stcroix"
Reviews.Content: I bought 3 of these alarms based on favorable reviews.  They were inexpensive, very easy to use, and LOUD.  We were going on vacation and I wanted them to put under outside doors to give me that extra insurance of a good night's sleep.  I didn't feel we were going to an unsafe area, but nowadays you never know, and I did sleep great knowing this noise would wake up the neighborhood!  When we returned home, I gave them to my son to use in their rental home since they have had a few breakin's in his neighborhood.  Better to be safe than sorry.

Reviews.Title: It really works!
Reviews.Author: Love
Reviews.Content: We are going abroad soon and don't know about the security of some of our hotels. I tried this out on my bedroom door and it made my grandson cry it was so loud. Don't think I could sleep through that.

Reviews.Title: Works well, loud!
Reviews.Author: Habanero
Reviews.Content: Nice product, especially at this price. Some adjustments for placement may be needed depending on the bottom of your door. Loud!

Reviews.Title: Its just as describe.loud
Reviews.Author: David J. Wheeler
Reviews.Content: Its just as describe.The siren is super loud. It seems well built and not all cheap plastic.Looks nice too.A+. The .Shipping wast fast.

Reviews.Title: it's ok
Reviews.Author: Courtney J. Walsh "CJ Walsh"
Reviews.Content: It's loud as expected. But it needed some weight behind it in order to work. We had to 'lock it in place' so that when the door opens the alarm doesn't move; locking it in place gaunente's it stays where we put it. SO, for that reason it's a pain in the butt to use and we often forget to set it up.3 alarm settings (low, med, high). We cant use high at all since as soon as you touch it it screams; so we keep ours to medium.Make sure your door is flush with the ground before buying this. It was an over sight for us.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: John R.  Nitro, WV
Reviews.Content: I ordered 4 of these.  Three of them work perfect.  The other one works well also, but it is quite a bit quieter than the others.  If not for that I would have gave it 5 stars.  They also make it harder to open the door from the outside.

Reviews.Title: will scare the Hades out  of intruders!!!!
Reviews.Author: Goober/KY
Reviews.Content: This doorstop alarm functions two ways, as a door stop that will slow down an intruder,  and as  an alarm  that is very  loud and irritating. By the time, the bad guy defeats the doorstop, you will be on the spot and armed or will have notified 911. I purchased 6 for my home and 4 for my son's home.

Reviews.Title: Great for home security
Reviews.Author: Phyllis E. Rose
Reviews.Content: We have one for every outside door to our home and bought extras.  We gave some to our parents and our children

Reviews.Title: You cannot beat this Protection for the Price
Reviews.Author: R. Bruns "Rock Front Man"
Reviews.Content: This thing is 120db and will wake up the dead. My wife and I bought these as back-ups to our regular home security and franklyI feel safe knowing that you can hear these things everywhere in out house.

Reviews.Title: Door alarm, a safe and secure feeling
Reviews.Author: Cecelia Knights
Reviews.Content: It's perfect and I feel so much safer when I travel and have to stay in a strange hotel room.

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: ComradeButterfly
Reviews.Content: Pros:- Small in size- Has different setting and the loudest is really really loud and impressive.- Stops the door mainly when it is set on carpet- Easy to turn on and offCons:- Does not work well on tile floor- If the door is opened very slowly it tends to set it off but it does not jam the door. To fix this problem I usually set a heavy object behind it so that it doesn't slid and it ends up jamming the door and doing its job.I would definitely recommend this product. It arrived on time and just as described and I have been using it since then.

Reviews.Title: I purchased several of these.
Reviews.Author: Jim Carlile
Reviews.Content: I purchased several of these as stocking stuffers. So for all have liked them. Great for security when traveling this time of year.

Reviews.Title: VERY loud
Reviews.Author: Teresa Sanders
Reviews.Content: I gave it my daughter for protection since her husband worked nights.  She forgot it was at the door and opened the door and some how the spring came out. I haven't since it to see if it can be fixed. Not the items fault.

Reviews.Title: excellent product from and excellent company
Reviews.Author: bell
Reviews.Content: i recieved the product faster than i expected. This is the way you keep customers coming back . I intend to order many more for realitives. Thank you for such a great price and a excellent product at an affordable price.  A.Bell .

Reviews.Title: LOUUUUD
Reviews.Author: Kelly L. McClelland "kelly"
Reviews.Content: Works as expected. LOUD when triggered-just what I wanted. Will deter anyone that isn't supposed to be coming in your house!

Reviews.Title: Loud, loud, loud.
Reviews.Author: Evan K
Reviews.Content: I really like this item.  The speaker is really loud and disorienting. You can adjust the sensitivity of the pressure plate, so I leave it at the highest setting.  I put one by all my doors at night, but they can easily go on a window sill as well.  I imagine that any burglar would be freeked out and run off like crazy when this thing goes off, but even if he/they didn't, you can be alerted to an intruder as soon as they make entry and that's definitely a plus when it comes to defending you and your family.

Reviews.Title: Great alarm system!
Reviews.Author: wlpowel
Reviews.Content: Very good alarm to put behind a door. The alarm is loud and piercing. Just what I wanted. I ordered 3 of them. I highly recommend this item.

Reviews.Title: Only cockroach would hear the alarm!
Reviews.Author: sd
Reviews.Content: I was excited to get this item but when it arrived, I was disappointed.  I bought two new batteries but nothing.  Waste!

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Joeshade
Reviews.Content: The first time I tried to use this device, it slid back with the door, leaving the plastic bottom plate, covered with sticky glue on the floor. This thing is shoddily made and non-functional. Save your money, or buy a Bell and Howell.

Reviews.Title: Jammed
Reviews.Author: Cindy Schmelter
Reviews.Content: We are unable to open the battery compartment, so we just use it as a door stop with no alarm.  We never tried to return the item, because it's not worth the trouble.

Reviews.Title: Can't wait to give it a try
Reviews.Author: Annmarie
Reviews.Content: After watching a home invasion on TV, I wanted to beef up home security and this device was mentioned as an option. Haven't tried it yet as I just received my package a couple of days ago. I purchased a couple of extra one's to send to my two nieces who will be going away to college!!

Reviews.Title: Piece of JUNK!
Reviews.Author: Robert W. Vaughn Jr.
Reviews.Content: The device would not sound an alarm without pressing the sliver "pad" down several different times and trying several different angles.  It was a crap shoot as to when the alarm would actually sound which was FAR fewer times than not.  It was, however, cheap enough so as not to even bother wasting my time (and return postage) to send back for a refund.  I cannot honestly say whether the company would have refunded me or not because I didn't bother contacting them.  I just took this as one of those "live and learn" lessons.  Learn from my mistake and AVOID this item!

Reviews.Title: just what we needed
Reviews.Author: Candice
Reviews.Content: works just as supposed to. We love it for the new french doors that we installed. small enough to not get in the way and easy enough to set up

Reviews.Title: Door Stop Alarm
Reviews.Author: Sherri M. Groves
Reviews.Content: It has a very, very loud alarm. But I tried it on my door and now everytime I try to turn it on, the alarm keeps going off. I tried taking the battery out and putting it back in and then turning on but the alarm still goes off. I am going to try a little more with it - if it would work without the alarm constantly being on, it would be great because it's so loud. But alas, it has a fault and it's not worth the hassle of sending it back for the cost I paid for it.

Reviews.Title: Poor quality
Reviews.Author: mzeina
Reviews.Content: The thing fell apart while unpacking. The rubber that is glued to the bottom of device and is meant to prevent the thing from sliding just fell off and I must glue it back.

Reviews.Title: Great price for, piece of mind, I hadn't had in a whille.
Reviews.Author: Bazzango "A Thing er Two Studio"
Reviews.Content: A nice and loud electric chirping to scare the vile creatures that want to take advantage of what ever they can get away with.  3 settings for sensitivity and now I can leave my slider open a tad for my cats to come and go from the deck.  We're all very happy and feel safer and secure with these devices.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Once burned twice shy
Reviews.Content: great alarm

Reviews.Title: recived
Reviews.Author: Gisela Ferreira
Reviews.Content: very veru nice, make noise and is good to theat theath. i am happy thanks for good choice i need to windows

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Marcia McCallum
Reviews.Content: Love it, especially for travel. Another layer of security for a small investment. Very loud alarm which should scare away intruders.

Reviews.Title: Door Stop Alarms
Reviews.Author: Carl Johnson
Reviews.Content: One of the Alarms arrived in 2 pieces.At times, the Alarms would trigger if the sensitivity was set to "high" after the "on" switch had been turned on

Reviews.Title: Great for Alerts!!
Reviews.Author: Payne
Reviews.Content: I purchased a few of these since I could not install a professional alarm in the rental property where I live.  Since it is good for placing under hotel room doors, I will be using one for alerts while I'm sleeping, although my door will be well-secured.  After testing this item, it will wake up a so-called 'sound' sleeper -- the noise is screeching, which is good if one needs to be alerted of a possible intrusion.

Reviews.Title: It serves its purpose.
Reviews.Author: Emma
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my boyfriend's new house. It arrived on time, and he was very satisfied with how it works.

Reviews.Title: Door Stop Alarm
Reviews.Author: Woodrow A. Hodges Jr.
Reviews.Content: Really like this product.Can easly be packed in a suit case for traveling.Nice to have in a hotel room to let you know if someone is trying to get in.Has a really loud alarm so might possibly scare a intruder away.I bought two of these as the price is great.

Reviews.Title: This item does not work well
Reviews.Author: Bill Hedden
Reviews.Content: I ordered two of these door stop alarms, and neither works well. One scarcely works at all.1) One of the two has a bad case of laryngitis--I don't think it would wake me up if I was sitting next to it.2) As others have mentioned, these have very slick bottoms and slide with the door when it opens, even if wedged tightly. If I wedge it TOO tightly, it sounds the alarm as soon as I turn on the switch.3) Pressure on the leading edge will not trip the alarm--pressure must be applied at least half-way back on the trip lever. This alarm wouldn't work at all with a door that has a small clearance to the floor.4) The alarms are very INsensitive to pressure, and the sensitivity switch seems to have no effect.5) The only way I can see this alarm working is to screw a block of wood behind it to hold it in place. Carpet doesn't work, and neither does skid-proof material placed beneath.The only positive feature is that once it is tripped, it keeps sounding the alarm until manually turned off.Not worth the cost of shipping.

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: Chris Calabrese
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my daughter in her apartment. She likes it, it gives her a piece of mind. Load enough too. She also takes it on trips to give her a piece of mind in the hotel room.

Reviews.Title: door alarm
Reviews.Author: GiGi
Reviews.Content: Easy to pack, I took the batteries out while I packed it.  It sets up easily and makes my family very happy when I am on the road.  The 'quiet' setting is loud!

Reviews.Title: Door stopper.
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: I love this product! However, I gave it only 4 stars because if the rubber bottom is dusty in anyway, it will not work. So, always test before using. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: So-So
Reviews.Author: pking
Reviews.Content: The alarm does not engage that quickly, in other words it is not that sensitive and it slides about on tile when the door is open.Have not tried it on rug nor on any trip, but I will.

Reviews.Title: LOUD
Reviews.Author: Frank Pomerleau "Frank"
Reviews.Content: It can scare you or anyone else when it goes off. You should have a backup reporting system in place also.

Reviews.Title: Meets the need
Reviews.Author: Samuel McDaniel
Reviews.Content: Perfect cheap door alarm and stop. Loud, you won't sleep through this alarm going off. Would be intruders will be met with ear piercing alarm. Quality isn't the greatest but is what is.

Reviews.Title: Look no further if you want LOUD!!
Reviews.Author: karen
Reviews.Content: These were obscenely cheap but with kinda high postage, so I crossed my fingers (and of course, checked stats) before ordering 6 of these. It was a great choice, and even with shipping (which was very nearly the entire cost), it was still the best price anywhere online or locally.These are LOUD and exactly what I wanted.You may have to be creative with how you wedge these but don't give up!  I've had some nighttime thuggery and nosy neighbors who like to just 'pop in' without warning, so besides the standard under the door, I've also used these for sliding glass windows and placed inside the latch on storm/screen doors, so I don't get more 'surprises'.There are low, medium and high sensitivity settings along with the on/off switch and they're easy to use...Very  good purchase---now if I could just train the cat and dog to use these to let me know when it's 'time' to go out!!

Reviews.Title: Useful
Reviews.Author: Kage
Reviews.Content: For a guy that has thievery problems in the neighborhood and sleeps like a rock, this alarm is the perfect tool.

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed!
Reviews.Author: Darlene Rezendes
Reviews.Content: I ordered these door alarms because my daughter worried about someone coming in. I rent so I couldn't put on the bolts that would make her feel safer. These are PERFECT! They are very sensitive and loud enough to scare off any intruder. I would recommend them highly!

Reviews.Title: Trademark Global 72-0850 Super Door Stop Alarm -
Reviews.Author: AngelAnnie
Reviews.Content: This is an alarm that slips under your door. The sound is loud enough to be heard by the neighbors. There is a switch on the back to turn it off, or reset it.

Reviews.Title: Great alarm
Reviews.Author: SWake
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, adjustable volume and loud enough to scare off any invaders...I Highly recommend this alarm and great price.

Reviews.Title: Door alarm
Reviews.Author: Lynsey
Reviews.Content: Good loud noise. Does make me feel safer in the house. Would buy another and reccomend to friends and family

Reviews.Title: I have 8 of these now and they have met my expectations.
Reviews.Author: Yarle39
Reviews.Content: They work very well when you are at home or staying in a hotel. They are, of course, just about useless as an alarm when no one is inside your home or hotel room. The they do what they were designed to do... alert you when someone open the door where it was set.

Reviews.Title: LOUD
Reviews.Author: eagles fly
Reviews.Content: These work really well and are very loud.  Purchased for a friend and her kids that live alone.  She said they are loud and work well.

Reviews.Title: Travel accessory
Reviews.Author: Tobydobe "Tobydobe"
Reviews.Content: I do a lot of international travel. Although I stay in very good hotels, inns, etc. an extra layer of protection is always good. Easy to have in suitcase.

Reviews.Title: Didn't work for me
Reviews.Author: Angela
Reviews.Content: I bought this to use when I travel but it doesn't work on tile floors or for doors that are cut with big gaps. It does make a loud piercing noise and still good to use (press by hand) as a safety alarm if needing help.

Reviews.Title: LOUD!
Reviews.Author: robert
Reviews.Content: Awesome!! I am so happy. The sensitivity feature is nice. And it is LOUD. No one is goinf to open a door without waking the whole house. LOUD!!!

Reviews.Title: Impressed
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: This stopper is unbelievably loud and has impressive traction to the floor. It is a great gift for the price.

Reviews.Title: I does not work well on hardwood floor!
Reviews.Author: John K "John K"
Reviews.Content: I does not work well on hardwood floor , even though it has a rubberized bottom  it slides back with the door about 4" before it engages the pressure plate .  This will probably work better on carpeted floors . The sound level ,and sensitivity option on this unit works well.

Reviews.Title: Jolt Alarm
Reviews.Author: Bargain Hunter "Kelly P"
Reviews.Content: The Trademark Global Super Door Stop Alarm really works. The sound is loud and piercing. This product is an inexpensive warning device that can be moved and utilized on any door. Purchase more than one to use around the house.

Reviews.Title: works well
Reviews.Author: Puppy Vendetta Wrath "Puppy Vendetta Wrath"
Reviews.Content: This really annoys and catch mice...if you know what I mean. Everyone will hear the next time some goes sneaking through your dorm rom..heh heh heh.....

Reviews.Title: Trademark Global Door Stop Alarm
Reviews.Author: keedle
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use.  You can take it while you are traveling.  The alarm is very loud.  It would scare any one away.

Reviews.Title: Works Great!
Reviews.Author: kate
Reviews.Content: I bought three of these.  Two for my parents to use in their house (they were recently burgled) and one for my apartment.  The ones for my parents work great!  The alarm is LOUD and when you open the door they go off immediately.  The one for my apartment doesn't work with my door - there isn't enough space for it to really hold - when the door opens it just pushes back.  I moved it to my bedroom door and it works fine but I would feel better if I can figure out a way for it to work on my front door.  Not the products fault.  I love them and for the price - you can't beat that extra feeling of security.  I know it's not going to keep anyone out but it will give you a heads up if someone is trying to come in.

Reviews.Title: Its great
Reviews.Author: tammy c. steele
Reviews.Content: We were at a very nice hotel (hyatt) another persons key card unlocked our door in the middle of the night!  Luckily we had the safety bar on. Ive stayed in another hyatt since that did not have a safety bar, i felt safe because of this! I tested it at home before we left, and make sure to change batteries every trip. It gives you peace of mind!

Reviews.Title: I don't get the positive reviews, this product does not work.
Reviews.Author: Dee "Dee from PA"
Reviews.Content: It does not stop the door, either on carpet or hardwood. It's worthless. It slides along the floor with the door as it opens. I sent it back. Don't waste your money. You'd be better off putting a chair wedged under the door knob.

Reviews.Title: Shadow People took it
Reviews.Author: Royce Boswell
Reviews.Content: Either the Shadow People, the Green Loctite People, the Penny People or maybe the NSA took it......or maybe I misplaced it.....only the Shadow knows.

Reviews.Title: As Seen On TV - Door Stop Alarm
Reviews.Author: dallastx3
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my granddaughter in College for her safety. I have not had the opportunity to use it myself.

Reviews.Title: Trademark Global 72-0850 Super Door Stop Alarm - Great for Traveling - As...
Reviews.Author: John Bryant
Reviews.Content: Trademark Global 72-0850 Super Door Stop Alarm - Great for Traveling - As... I haven't used them yet.. I got two of them. The base and my door. I am not sure if it would fit.. But I haven't tried yet.. besides no batteries for them right now. So, it hasn't been tested yet.

Reviews.Title: Door alarm 72-0850
Reviews.Author: Franklin V. Price "very bad"
Reviews.Content: I read through the reviews and felt this product would monitor my doors for security purposes. I found the following concerns. 1-No power on light and 2- No battery level indicator and 3- No self test feature and 4- May not be skid poof.

Reviews.Title: Does not deserve even a one star.
Reviews.Author: M. Gururaj
Reviews.Content: It is a cheap roadside made product from china. Quit working less than an hour of opening. Don't waste your money on this.

Reviews.Title: Aweful!  Doesn't work!
Reviews.Author: CAA1961
Reviews.Content: Total waste of money.  Device doesn't work at all!  Put the 9 volt battery in and nothing!  Don't waste your time or money even looking at this thing!

Reviews.Title: Looks good
Reviews.Author: M. Barnes "Liz"
Reviews.Content: Fortunately, haven't had to try it. But, it does give peace of mind and I'm glad to own it.

Reviews.Title: Waste
Reviews.Author: Alfredo
Reviews.Content: Useless for me.  Doesn't work for us. It's collecting dust but it could be because our door. I guess it could be our door.

Reviews.Title: buyer beware!!!!
Reviews.Author: jp
Reviews.Content: Buyer beware stay away this is a waste of your hard earned cash!! Do not relie on this piece of junk to alert you or your family .don't be your life on this. I recevied mine in the mail and it works when it wants

ProductInfo.Features:
Sensitive 120 dB alarm
Prevents door from opening
Adjustable sensitivity
ProductInfo.Name: Trademark Global 72-0850 Super Door Stop Alarm - Great for Traveling - As Seen on TV
